Articles.Content:
Is there a way, either in stock or from a pre-existing mod, to:

1. Hide a resource converter from a part so that it doesn’t show up in the GUI?

2. Activate multiple resource converters at once with the single GUI button?

I’m trying to avoid cluttering up the GUI with multiple resource converters. If there isn’t a way to do it already, I will try making a plug-in myself.
